definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: By no means will this method produce satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法決不會產生令人滿意的結果。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to the determination of trace tantalum in stone coal flag with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 該法已應用於石煤渣中痕量鉭的測定，結果令人滿意。

sentences.english: And so, each hydrogen has access to each electron, and now we have a satisfied system.
sentences.chinese: 每個氫原子都有兩個電子，這是一個令人滿意的體系。

sentences.english: Compared with the practical engineering data, the calculated results are satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 經與實際工程資料對比，計算結果比較令人滿意。

sentences.english: This word has no satisfactory equivalent in English.
sentences.chinese: 這個詞在英語中沒有令人滿意的對應詞。

sentences.english: Through production test, the results are satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 通過試油驗證，效果是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: In the end, America pulled through nicely.
sentences.chinese: 最終，美國隊令人滿意地涉險過關。

sentences.english: This can have the desirable effect of reducing redundant declarations.
sentences.chinese: 這樣可以產生減少冗餘聲明這種令人滿意的效果。

sentences.english: Q7. Do you think their jobs and salary are satisfactory?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得他們的工作和工資令人滿意嗎？

sentences.english: Organizers of the tours, however, say that they satisfy a need.
sentences.chinese: 考察團組織者說，目前的需求是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: The co- operative movement is not satisfactory either.
sentences.chinese: 合作運動也還不能令人滿意。

sentences.english: During the 8 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Belarus, the general development of bilateral relations has been at a satisfactory level.
sentences.chinese: 中白建交八年來，兩國關係的總體發展水平令人滿意。

sentences.english: The comparison of a 24-hr wind forecast with the ship observations shows a satisfactory agreement.
sentences.chinese: 予報結果和實況相比是令人滿意的。

sentences.english: How will schools with unsatisfactory results be re-structured?
sentences.chinese: 如何重建那些質量不令人滿意的學校？

sentences.english: Using the new relationship, some field test piles are computed, and the results are satisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 把新關係式應用於現場試樁計算，結果令人滿意。

sentences.english: He shows me some works, none of which is satisfying.
sentences.chinese: 他向我展示了一些作品，其中沒有一個是令人滿意的。
